name: Tetris Party
description: Tetris Party is a figma widget that allows you to play Tetris with other people.

scripts.test: npm run tsc && npm run build
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc:widget && npm run tsc:ui
scripts.tsc:watch: concurrently -n widget,iframe "npm run tsc:widget -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "npm run tsc:ui -- --watch --preserveWatchOutput"
scripts.build: npm run build:ui && npm run build:widget
scripts.build:production: npm run build:ui && npm run build:widget -- --minify
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -n widget,iframe "npm run build:widget -- --watch" "npm run build:ui -- --watch"

author: Minseon Kim
